predicate.note: Frames file for 'billow' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to spread over a large area

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The Bartlesville , Okla. , oil company late yesterday still had n't said officially what [*T*-1] caused the explosions and fires , which [*T*-2] sent columns of heavy black smoke billowing high into the air .
